sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.DS_CTAC_PSN_RELN_PK AS DS_CTAC_PSN_RELN_PK FROM DS_CTAC_PSN_RELN A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.CTAC_PSN_PK = #ctacPsnPk# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SVC_MACH_CTAC_PSN A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = #svcMachMstrPk# AND A.DS_CTAC_PNT_PK = #dsCtacPntPk# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
